title: Case Studies on Intellectual Property (IP Advantage)
description: Intellectual property creation and exploitation: explore how patents, trademarks, copyright, designs and geographical indications work in practice.
cleaned_text: The case studies in the IP Advantage database offer insights into how IP works in the real world, and how its successful exploitation can contribute to development. Feedback Please [contact us](/contact/en/area.jsp?area=ipadvantage) to submit feedback and suggestions for new case studies.
